remarks: Value of the inverse relation.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 2-Jan-2017.)
statement:
invfval.b $e |- B = ( Base ` C ) $.
invfval.n $e |- N = ( Inv ` C ) $.
invfval.c $e |- ( ph -> C e. Cat ) $.
invfval.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. B ) $.
invfval.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. B ) $.
invfval.s $e |- S = ( Sect ` C ) $.
invffval $p |- ( ph -> N = ( x e. B , y e. B |-> ( ( x S y ) i^i `' ( y S x ) ) ) ) $.
$d B x y $.
$d C x y $.
$d S x y $.
$d X x y $.
$d Y x y $.
$d ph x y $.
